title: Genesis Chapter 11 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 11 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: According to Genesis 11:5, who came down to see the city and the tower?
questions.explanation: Genesis 11:5 states: "And the LORD came down to see the city and the tower, which the children of men builded."

questions.question: According to Genesis 11:30, who was barren?
questions.explanation: Genesis 11:30 states: "But Sarai was barren; she had no child."

questions.question: Where was Abram according to Genesis 11:26?
questions.explanation: Genesis 11:26 states: "And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran."

questions.question: Where was Abram according to Genesis 11:27?
questions.explanation: Genesis 11:27 states: "Now these are the generations of Terah: Terah begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran; and Haran begat Lot."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 11:28?
questions.explanation: Genesis 11:28 states: "And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees."
